configurations.name: Gen Certs for Dev
configurations.command: mkdir -p target/debug/certs && openssl genrsa -out target/debug/certs/key.pem 2048 && openssl req -new -x509 -key target/debug/certs/key.pem -out target/debug/certs/cert.pem -days 365 -subj "/CN=localhost" && chmod 600 target/debug/certs/key.pem && chmod 644 target/debug/certs/cert.pem && echo "Self-signed certificates generated in target/debug/certs/"
